```{r setup}
options(conflicts.policy = "depends.ok")
library(anchorMplus)
library(psych)
library(dplyr)
```

The use of this package is demonstrated by a complete CFA on the famous
`psych::bfi` dataset.

# Column Types

Annotate each column with an R data type.

```{r types}
bfi <-
  psych::bfi %>%
  mutate(across(matches("^[A-Z][1-5]$"), ordered, 1:6)) %>% 
  mutate(across("gender", factor, 1:2, labels = c("M", "F"))) %>% 
  mutate(across("education", ordered, 1:5))

bfi
```
